content.p: The Facility Group brings together managers of multi-user facilities across the University in a co-ordinated approach with the following goals: State of the Art Mass Spectrometry Imaging NGS and Sanger Seqeuncing DNP assisted magic-angle spinning solid-state NMR 3D X-Ray CT Imaging Automated Compound Screening Nanoscale and Microscale Research Centre Magnetic Resonance Imaging & Spectroscopy Liquid handing and high throughput screening High Field NMR Facility State of the Art Microscopy Medical Imaging University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD +44 (0) 115 951 6046 research@nottingham.ac.uk
